snippet: When the master fund-raiser needs to do a little business, he calls on his pals Bill Clinton and Haley Barbour, writes Mark Leibovich in this week's New York Times Magazine.
abstract: When the master fund-raiser needs to do a little business, he calls on his pals Bill Clinton and Haley Barbour, writes Mark Leibovich in this week's New York Times Magazine.

headline.main: From the Magazine: Terry McAuliffe and the Other Green Party
